data.title: A Game that People with Disabilities could Play
data.meta_description:
Game requirements:The ability to drag items and to left click on the screen. 
 For many years, I searched the internet for games I could play. Many of the games had timers and I knew those games wouldn’t work for me, so I kept looking on the internet. I finally found a website that had games without timers, the website is called www.bigfishgames.com. Big Fish Games have games to play on your PC, MAC, Mobile Device, Ipad or on the Big Fish website. If you join their club, it’s $6.99 per month ver
data.text:
For many years, I searched the internet for games I could play. Many of the games had timers and I knew those games wouldn’t work for me, so I kept looking on the internet. I finally found a website that had games without timers, the website is called www.bigfishgames.com.

. If you join their club, it’s $6.99 per month verses paying $13.99 for every game. I have been told if you download a game verses playing on the website, you can’t get viruses on your computer. All of the download games don’t have any viruses. There are several categories of games, the one I like is called “Hidden Objects”. These games have a beautiful background, so you get immersed in playing them.
